comment: A very great professor! I don't know how to do art, so as long as you are trying in your projects, you should be good! The projects were very easy and fun to do! I never needed to stress anything about this class, it was an easy A! I definitely would take her again!

Grade is based off of 9 projects and attendance. As long as you try and modify based on the feedback given in class, you'll get a good grade. Super understanding, would take another class with her if I was an art major.
